fashion.name: Batik Wrap Skirt
fashion.description: Embrace timeless elegance with this batik wrap skirt, perfect for both casual and formal outings. Its flowing design adds a touch of grace to every step.

fashion.name: Batik Tote Bag
fashion.description: Carry style with you! This spacious and durable tote combines traditional batik patterns with modern functionality.

fashion.name: Rattan Handbag with Batik Trim
fashion.description: Make a statement with this one-of-a-kind handbag. A perfect blend of rustic rattan and vibrant batik details.

fashion.name: Batik Scarf
fashion.description: Lightweight and versatile, this scarf is your go-to accessory for adding a splash of color and tradition to any outfit.

fashion.name: Batik Hair Accessories
fashion.description: From chic headbands to playful scrunchies, these accessories bring a pop of batik charm to your everyday look.

decor.name: Rattan Basket Set
decor.description: Declutter in style! These handwoven baskets are practical, durable, and oh-so-beautiful for every corner of your home.

decor.name: Batik Table Runner
decor.description: Brighten up your dining table with this vibrant batik runner, adding a perfect cultural touch to any meal setting.

decor.name: Rattan Serving Tray with Batik Accents
decor.description: Impress your guests with this stunning tray, blending natural rattan with elegant batik patterns.

decor.name: Batik Cushion Covers
decor.description: Transform your living space with these cozy yet artistic cushion covers, featuring hand-dyed batik designs.

decor.name: Rattan Lanterns with Batik Shades
decor.description: Light up your home with these enchanting lanterns, combining rustic rattan and soft batik hues.

lifestyle.name: DIY Batik Kit
lifestyle.description: Unleash your creativity! This kit has everything you need to design your own unique batik masterpiece.

lifestyle.name: Rattan & Batik Keychains
lifestyle.description: Carry a piece of art with you. These handmade keychains are small but full of charm and tradition.

lifestyle.name: Batik Journal with Rattan Binding
lifestyle.description: Perfect for your thoughts or sketches, this journal is as artistic as the ideas you’ll jot inside.

lifestyle.name: Batik Picnic Mat with Rattan Strap
lifestyle.description: Take your picnics up a notch with this stylish mat, easy to carry and perfect for outdoor fun.

lifestyle.name: Batik Stationery Set
lifestyle.description: Add a personal touch to your desk with this handcrafted stationery set, perfect for notes or gifts.

gifts.name: Tea Lover’s Set
gifts.description: Delight tea lovers with this beautifully curated set, featuring batik coasters and a rattan tray for the perfect tea ritual.

gifts.name: Self-Care Hamper
gifts.description: Pamper yourself or a loved one with this thoughtful collection of batik headbands, artisanal soaps, and candles.

gifts.name: Picnic Basket Bundle
gifts.description: A complete picnic experience, including a handwoven rattan basket, batik napkins, and elegant tableware.

gifts.name: Artisan Gift Box
gifts.description: Curated with love, this box offers a mix of stunning batik and rattan crafts for any occasion.

gifts.name: Cultural Keepsake Box
gifts.description: Celebrate tradition with this collection of handmade treasures, blending batik and rattan artistry.
